---
title: "Data visualization"
---
    
There should be some data visualization here.   
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("readr")
library("ggplot2")
test <- read_csv("test.csv")
test
test1 <- test$Date
test2 <- test$`Number of infected`
ggplot(data = test, aes(x = test1, y = test2)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity",fill="purple") +
  labs(title = "Todal daily vaccinated",
           substitute = "2021",
           x = "Date", y = "Vaccinated infected (day)")

```
THIS A PARAGRAPH
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)

body <- list("resource_uri" = "218d49de-88a8-472a-9bb2-b2a373bd7ab4")
r <- POST("https://data.egov.bg/api/getResourceData", body = body, encode = "json")
r1 <- fromJSON(rawToChar(r$content))

x <- as.data.frame(r1[[2]])

x = x[-1,]
x[[1]]<-as.Date(x[[1]],"%Y/%m/%d")
x[[5]]<-as.numeric(x[[5]])
date <- x[[1]]
numberOfInfected <- x[[5]]
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = x, aes(x = date, y = numberOfInfected)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity",fill="purple") +
  labs(title = "Todal daily vaccinated",
           substitute = "2021",
           x = "Date", y = "Vaccinated infected (day)")

```
